Paul<S>3972</S>, an apostle<S>652</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> by<S>2596</S> the commandment<S>2003</S> of God<S>2316</S> our<S>2257</S> Saviour<S>4990</S>, and<S>2532</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, which<S>3588</S> is our<S>2257</S> hope<S>1680</S>;
Unto Timothy<S>5095</S>, my own<S>1103</S> son<S>5043</S> in<S>1722</S> the faith<S>4102</S>: Grace<S>5485</S>, mercy<S>1656</S>, and peace<S>1515</S>, from<S>575</S> God<S>2316</S> our<S>2257</S> Father<S>3962</S> and<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S>.
As<S>2531</S> I besought<S>3870</S> thee<S>4571</S> to abide still<S>4357</S> at<S>1722</S> Ephesus<S>2181</S>, when I went<S>4198</S> into<S>1519</S> Macedonia<S>3109</S>, that<S>2443</S> thou mightest charge<S>3853</S> some<S>5100</S> that they teach<S>2085</S> no<S>3361</S> other doctrine<S>2085</S>,
Neither<S>3366</S> give heed<S>4337</S> to fables<S>3454</S> and<S>2532</S> endless<S>562</S> genealogies<S>1076</S>, which<S>3748</S> minister<S>3930</S> questions<S>2214</S>, rather<S>3123</S> than<S>2228</S> godly<S>2316</S> edifying<S>3620</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> faith<S>4102</S>: so do.
Now<S>1161</S> the end<S>5056</S> of the commandment<S>3852</S> is<S>2076</S> charity<S>26</S> out of<S>1537</S> a pure<S>2513</S> heart<S>2588</S>, and<S>2532</S> of a good<S>18</S> conscience<S>4893</S>, and<S>2532</S> of faith<S>4102</S> unfeigned<S>505</S>:
From which<S>3739</S> some<S>5100</S> having swerved<S>795</S> have turned aside<S>1624</S> unto<S>1519</S> vain jangling<S>3150</S>; <sup>having: or, not aiming at</sup>
Desiring<S>2309</S> to be<S>1511</S> teachers of the law<S>3547</S>;<S>3361</S> understanding<S>3539</S> neither<S>3383</S> what<S>3739</S> they say<S>3004</S>, nor<S>3383</S> whereof<S>4012</S> <S>5101</S> they affirm<S>1226</S>.
But<S>1161</S> we know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> the law<S>3551</S> is good<S>2570</S>, if<S>1437</S> a man<S>5100</S> use<S>5530</S> it<S>846</S> lawfully<S>3545</S>;
Knowing<S>1492</S> this<S>5124</S>, that<S>3754</S> the law<S>3551</S> is<S>2749</S> not<S>3756</S> made<S>2749</S> for a righteous man<S>1342</S>, but<S>1161</S> for the lawless<S>459</S> and<S>2532</S> disobedient<S>506</S>, for the ungodly<S>765</S> and<S>2532</S> for sinners<S>268</S>, for unholy<S>462</S> and<S>2532</S> profane<S>952</S>, for murderers of fathers<S>3964</S> and<S>2532</S> murderers of mothers<S>3389</S>, for manslayers<S>409</S>,
For whoremongers<S>4205</S>, for them that defile themselves with mankind<S>733</S>, for menstealers<S>405</S>, for liars<S>5583</S>, for perjured persons<S>1965</S>, and<S>2532</S> if there be any<S>1536</S> other thing<S>2087</S> that is contrary<S>480</S> to sound<S>5198</S> doctrine<S>1319</S>;
According<S>2596</S> to the glorious<S>1391</S> gospel<S>2098</S> of the blessed<S>3107</S> God<S>2316</S>, which<S>3739</S> was committed to<S>4100</S> my<S>1473</S> trust<S>4100</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I thank<S>2192</S> <S>5485</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S>, who<S>3588</S> hath enabled<S>1743</S> me<S>3165</S>, for<S>3754</S> that he counted<S>2233</S> me<S>3165</S> faithful<S>4103</S>, putting me<S>5087</S> into<S>1519</S> the ministry<S>1248</S>;
Who<S>3588</S> was<S>5607</S> before<S>4386</S> a blasphemer<S>989</S>, and<S>2532</S> a persecutor<S>1376</S>, and<S>2532</S> injurious<S>5197</S>: but<S>235</S> I obtained mercy<S>1653</S>, because<S>3754</S> I did<S>4160</S> it ignorantly<S>50</S> in<S>1722</S> unbelief<S>570</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the grace<S>5485</S> of our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> was exceeding abundant<S>5250</S> with<S>3326</S> faith<S>4102</S> and<S>2532</S> love<S>26</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>.
This is a faithful<S>4103</S> saying<S>3056</S>, and<S>2532</S> worthy<S>514</S> of all<S>3956</S> acceptation<S>594</S>, that<S>3754</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> came<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> the world<S>2889</S> to save<S>4982</S> sinners<S>268</S>; of whom<S>3739</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> chief<S>4413</S>.
Howbeit<S>235</S> for this<S>5124</S> cause<S>1223</S> I obtained mercy<S>1653</S>, that<S>2443</S> in<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S> first<S>4413</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> might shew forth<S>1731</S> all<S>3956</S> longsuffering<S>3115</S>, for<S>4314</S> a pattern<S>5296</S> to them which should hereafter<S>3195</S> believe<S>4100</S> on<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S> to<S>1519</S> life<S>2222</S> everlasting<S>166</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> unto the King<S>935</S> eternal<S>165</S>, immortal<S>862</S>, invisible<S>517</S>, the only<S>3441</S> wise<S>4680</S> God<S>2316</S>, be honour<S>5092</S> and<S>2532</S> glory<S>1391</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S> and ever<S>165</S>. Amen<S>281</S>.
This<S>5026</S> charge<S>3852</S> I commit<S>3908</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, son<S>5043</S> Timothy<S>5095</S>, according to<S>2596</S> the prophecies<S>4394</S> which went before<S>4254</S> on<S>1909</S> thee<S>4571</S>, that<S>2443</S> thou<S>4754</S> by<S>1722</S> them<S>846</S> mightest war<S>4754</S> a good<S>2570</S> warfare<S>4752</S>;
Holding<S>2192</S> faith<S>4102</S>, and<S>2532</S> a good<S>18</S> conscience<S>4893</S>; which<S>3739</S> some<S>5100</S> having put away<S>683</S> concerning<S>4012</S> faith<S>4102</S> have made shipwreck<S>3489</S>:
Of whom<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> Hymenaeus<S>5211</S> and<S>2532</S> Alexander<S>223</S>; whom<S>3739</S> I have delivered<S>3860</S> unto Satan<S>4567</S>, that<S>2443</S> they may learn<S>3811</S> not<S>3361</S> to blaspheme<S>987</S>.
